description: Upper balancing primes to prime-balanced factorials.
example: 127 is balancing 5!=120 from above, where 5!=120 is a balanced factorial
author: _Labos Elemer_ Feb 10 2000
extensions: The next two terms are 171!+397 and 190!+409, which are too large to include. - _Jud McCranie_, Jul 04 2000
